recipe.title: Summer Corn and Cod Chowder
ingredients: 8 scallions, thinly sliced, whites and greens separated
2 medium Yukon gold potatoes, peeled and cut in 1/2-inch dice
2 1/2 cups cups fresh or frozen corn kernels
instructions: In a large saucepan, cook bacon over medium heat until crisp, 6 minutes. Transfer to a paper towel-lined plate; crumble. In same pan, sauté scallion whites for 2 minutes. Add garlic; sauté 1 minute. Add flour; cook, stirring frequently, 2 minutes. Stir in potatoes, milk, broth, thyme, salt and pepper; bring to a boil. Reduce heat to medium-low; simmer 10 minutes. Stir in fish, corn and 2/3 bacon; simmer 5 minutes. Stir in half-and-half and 3/4 scallion greens; simmer 2 minutes. Ladle into bowls and garnish with remaining scallion greens and bacon.
